official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to allow married Federal retirees to modify spousal survivor annuity elections.

summary.text: Permits any married Federal retiree to change his or her election to provide for or not to provide for an annuity to a surviving spouse or to change the amount of such an annuity after three years have expired since the date of such election; provided the retiree has fulfilled requirements to notify his or her spouse of such a change.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to allow married Federal retirees to modify spousal survivor annuity elections.
